title: Born to Hate... Destined to Love
actors: Arjun Kapoor, Parineeti Chopra, Gauhar Khan, Anil Rastogi
plot: In the town of Almore, political rivals the Qureshis and the Chauhans have been fighting for generations. Boisterous and impulsive Zoya Qureshi campaigns for her father to become the next MLA. Meanwhile, Parma, an immature bully, will do anything to help his grandfather Chauhan win the election. The short-tempered young rivals brandish guns and trade insults. However, Parma is drawn to the beautiful and fearless Zoya, and she is intrigued by his rough charm. As the hotly-contested election approaches, the pair begin secretly meeting and their hatred ignites a passionate romance...
